definitions.definition: A two-dimensional magnitude that has length and breadth ; especially such a surface that forms the boundary of a solid .

subdefinitions.definition: The area of a two-dimensional surface .
The visible , external surface of a body .

definitions.definition: The surface (of something immaterial , especially of the mind or soul ).
A building intimately associated with the land on which it is built.

main_definition: ( geometry ) A two-dimensional magnitude that has length and breadth ; especially such a surface that forms the boundary of a solid .
secondary_definitions: The surface (of something immaterial , especially of the mind or soul ).
( law ) A building intimately associated with the land on which it is built.
